protocol.name: Affymetrix:Protocol:Hybridization-EukGE-WS2v5
protocol.text: Title: Affymetrix in vitro transcription. Description:

protocol.name: P-MEXP-15672
protocol.text: Expression data calculated with RMA method (Bioconductor; Bioinformatics 20, 307 315).

protocol.name: P-MEXP-7779
protocol.text: The growth chamber conditions were: 16/8 hrs (d/n) with white light (Neon tubes, cool white), 100 µEm-²h-1 PAR and 20 °C.  60 seeds were sowed in per 150 x 25 mm round dish, sealed with Urgopore tape and placed in darkness at 4oC for 3 days.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-7781
protocol.text: The experimental design comprised 3 replicates of each genotype, one replicate corresponding to one RNA extraction on a independent pool of about 150 plant apex.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-8074
text: Affymetrix  Labelling protocol for ARE-ATH1 array  The labelling protocol is applicable for use with the GeneChip ARE-ATH1 when starting with a minimal amount of 5ug total RNA.  The protocol is derived from the “GeneChip® Expression Analysis Technical Manual” (Section 2 Eukaryotic sample and array processing). The document can be found at the affymetrix website:

Within this document (expression_s2_manual.pdf), the following sections are applicable for the labelling protocol:  2.1.3 Eukaryotic Target Preparation 2.1.7 - 2.1.8 Reagents and Materials Required 2.1.13 - 2.1.18 One-Cycle cDNA Synthesis  2.1.32 - 2.1.33 Cleanup of Double Stranded cDNA for Both the One-Cycle and Two-Cycle Target Labelling Assays 2.1.34 - 2.1.35 Synthesis of Biotin-Labelled cRNA for both the One-Cycle and Two-Cycle Target Labelling Assays. 2.1.36 2.1.38– Cleanup and Quantification of Biotin-Labelled cRNA 2.1.39 – 2.1.40 Fragmenting the cRNA for Target Preparation

protocol.name: P-MEXP-9154
protocol.text: Plants of the wild-type Col and the atx1 mutant(Nottingham Seed Stock Center (NASC) code is ?). The shoot apex of plants (comprising shoot apex meristem, first and second leaf primordia at petiole-less stage) were harvested at the growth stage 1.0 removing the cotyledons and the hypocotyls and at least 4 hours after the beginning of the photoperiod when photosynthetic and metabolic activities of plants are stable (Boyes et al., 2001).

protocol.name: P-MEXP-9156
protocol.text: Total RNA was isolated using Qiagen RNeasy mini-kit (QIAGEN GmbH, Hilden, Germany)
